text: Kamen Rider Zero-One (also called Kamen Rider 01) is a Japanese tokusatsu drama Kamen Rider Franchise. ==Schedule== Super Hero Time joined Kishiryu Sentai Ryusoulger and later, Mashin Sentai Kiramager. ==Cast== * Aruto Hiden / Kamen Rider Zero-One: Fumiya Takahashi * Isamu Fuwa / Kamen Rider Vulcan: Ryutaro Okada * Is, As: Noa Tsurushima * Yua Yaiba / Kamen Rider Valkyrie: Hiroe Igeta * Jin / Kamen Rider Jin: Daisuke Nakagawa * Horobi / Kamen Rider Horobi: Syuya Sunagawa * Gai Amatsu / Kamen Rider Thouser: Nachi Sakuragi * Ikazuchi / Kamen Rider Ikazuchi: Daichi Yamaguchi * Naki / Kamen Rider Naki: Satsuki Nakayama * Shesta: Asumi Narita * Sanzō Yamashita: Arata Saeki * Assassin Humagear, Matsurida Z: Ryunosuke Matsumura * Soreo Hiden: Koji Yamamoto * Jun Fukuzoe: Kazuya Kojima * Korenosuke Hiden: Tokuma Nishioka * Ark (Voice), Ark Driver Voice: Show Hayami * Zat (Voice): Noriko Hidaka * Progrise and Zetsumerise Key Equipments Voice: Maynard Plant, Blaise Paint * Progrise and Zetsumerise Key Equipments Voice (Kamen Rider Thouser): Mark Weitzman * Narration: Kōichi Yamadera ===Guest cast=== * Himself (10, 11): Shinya Owada * Matsuda Enji (10, 11, 23, 24): Hiromi Sakimoto * Bengoshi Bingo (21, 22, 24): Keisuke Minami * Chiharu Ebi (21-24): Arisa Komiya * Enmusubi Match (23, 24): Ryōma Baba * Ikkei Amatsu (38): Kosei Kato * Williamson Yotagaki (42-44): Tomomi Maruyama * S (45): Hideaki Itō ===Reiwa The First Generation cast=== * Soreo Hiden / Kamen Rider Ichi-Gata: Koji Yamamoto * Time Jacker Finis: Rina Ikoma * Humagear Will: Sōkō Wada ===Real x Time cast=== * Behru / Kamen Rider Abandon: Seiji Fukushi * Mua / Kamen Rider Abandon: Mei Hata * Lugo / Kamen Rider Abandon: Yuu Oyama * Buga / Kamen Rider Abandon: Hirooki Goto * Akane Tono: Hirona Yamazaki * Es / Kamen Rider Eden: Hideaki Itō * Is / Kamen Rider Zero-Two, As: Noa Tsurushima ===Zero-One Others cast=== * Kamen Rider MetsubouJinrai: Monkey Majik * Kamen Rider Zaia / Lyon Arkland: Jai West ==Theme songs== ; Opening Theme * "REALxEYEZ" ** Lyrics: Shoko Fujibayashi, Takanori Nishikawa ** Composition: J ** Arrangement: JxTakanori Nishikawa, DJ'Tekina/Something ** Artist: JxTakanori Nishikawa ; Insert themes * "Omae o Tomerareru no wa Tada Hitori, Ore Da! ~Find a new life" ("There Is Only One Person Who Can Stop You, and That Is Me! ~Find a new life") ** Lyrics: Megane Hirai ** Composition & Arrangement: Go Sakabe ** Artist: Tsuyoshi Himura * "Henshin! Zero-Two ~Now is the right time" ("Transform! Zero-Two ~Now is the right time") ** Lyrics: Megane Hirai ** Composition & Arrangement: Go Sakabe ** Artist: Tsuyoshi Himura Category:Japanese science fiction television series Category:2019 Japanese television series debuts Category:2020 television series endings
title: Kamen Rider Zero-One
